title: [BUG] server.stat_expired_stale_perc be compared with an integer in src/expire.c
body:
By definition and usage, ``server.stat_expired_stale_perc`` should be a decimal, but it is compared with an integer of % here:
https://github.com/redis/redis/blob/5389fa62a64ddb277a58db4b21934d47cd298028/src/expire.c#L148-L150
